price: Revida o mal com o que é melhor. Nós somos bem Sabedor do que alegam.
arabic: ٱدۡفَعۡ بِٱلَّتِي هِيَ أَحۡسَنُ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَۚ نَحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَصِفُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: id'faʿ bi-allatī hiya aḥsanu al-sayi-ata naḥnu aʿlamu bimā yaṣifūna
